definition: without volition or conscious control, an automatic instinctive unlearned reaction to a stimulus
details:
adjective
- without volition or conscious control
= synonyms: automatic
noun
- an automatic instinctive unlearned reaction to a stimulus
= synonyms: reflex response, reflex action, instinctive reflex, innate reflex, inborn reflex, unconditioned reflex, physiological reaction
